title: Firewall error/black screen after champion select
body:
Hi everyone,

Some players may be experiencing firewall errors or just black screens after finishing champion select and are often required to restart their PC to get into game. While a fix for this issue is being worked on, our Technical Support team has passed on this workaround to help you get into game faster when the issue occurs:

Running an IP Release and Renew will reset IP address will allow you to reconnect quicker.

> Players using Windows can perform these steps:

* Exit the game completely

* Press the Windows Key or Navigate to the Windows Icon at the bottom left-hand corner.

* Type cmd

* Right-click the Command prompt shortcut and select "Run as Administrator" from the drop down menu. You should now see a black window with white
letters.

* Type ipconfig /release in the command prompt. Then press [Enter]
NOTE: This will disconnect you from the Internet.

* Type ipconfig /renew in the command prompt. Then press [Enter]

* Type ipconfig /flushdns in the command prompt. Then press [Enter]

* Type exit in the command prompt. Then Press [Enter]

* Relaunch League of Legends and attempt to reconnect.

> Players that use Macs can perform these steps:

* Exit the game completely.

* Open your Apple Menu at the top left-hand corner

* Click the System Preferences

* Then Select Network.

* Choose the type of connection that you are using
NOTE: If you are connected through an Ethernet cable, choose Ethernet. If you are connected through wireless, choose Wi-Fi.

* Click the Advanced option

* Click the 'Renew DHCP Lease'

* Relaunch League of Legends and attempt to reconnect.

If you have any questions, please [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can address your concerns in a one on one setting. Please attach the following information when submitting a ticket:

* [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#jwq1)
* [NetworkInfo Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#jwq4)
* [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#jwq3)

replies.body:
tried it.. doesn't work
fix your %%%% riot

Just had this firwall 2 games in a row. Fix above didn't help, nither did rebooting tyhe Router or PC!

Anything else I can try because I really would prefer not to ruin 9 other peoples day, and end up with a leave buster.

As an aside, why doesn't leae buster engage when the game starts, rather than when people are still trying to conect?
This happens to me all the time, and I couldn't get back in the game  and currently in leaver buster for it... not happy. Can u get rid of my lever buster for your screw ups please?

ok ive been having this problem for a while now and i tryed everything and it didnt work..now i have to wait 20 minutes before queue!!
i lost so many ranked games because of this problem! pleaaaseee RIOT fix it...please remove the 20 minutes !

Yeah it stopped for me for a while, but its back with a vengeance again. RIOT games, I've paid alot of money for your content, and if you deny me the use of it through your own negligence and/or inaction to fix this issue which is indefinitely on your side, I will demand a full refund on what ive spent over my time on the rift.

Your fix doesn't work.

This happened the first time two days ago, I re-updated patch, happened again. Got done by leave buster. 

Re-installed, was all good. Updated patch, happened again. Probably going to get banned. Good times. Switching to NA until OCE figures out how to run a game properly.

Another way I've found to be extremely reliable is to
•Close lol
•Open task manager
•End all lol related processes
•Re open lol

This hasnt worked... Im getting really tired of these bugs that stop us from playing the game
Also, keep getting placed in leaverbuster/low pri que because of errors on your side. I got demoted to Bronze III (From Bronze I) because of various issues related to your service.

As much as this game is "Free to Play" I have invested enough money into various aspects of the game that I get reasonably angry when I cant play because of your screw ups :(

Dude there is a good alternative to when this issue happens again and you don't want leave buster to kick you. Since leave buster only works when you exit the game willingly you can just force close the game. And you can do that by:
1 Pres Ctrl+Alt+Delete
2 Select Task Manager
3 Click on LolClient (32 bit)
4 Click End Task
5 Restart Lol
Believe me I've left several games coz of this issue and I didn't get caught by leave buster even once!!! :D
I'm still having this problem and it's now September 2015 -_-

Hi Everyone,

While we investigate the cause of the recent rise in firewall errors, it would help us a lot if you could run the network diagnostic tool. This will collect the necessary network details of affected players and hopefully we draw similarities and derive possible solutions.

[Network Diagnostic Tool](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs)
Nothing? Been aaaaaages and there are still summoners suffering from this problem. Any chance you guys can actually get off your butts and do your jobs?

Well, working at a computer means primarily being on our butts, regrettably D:

Sorry for the lack of updates on this front. With the help of players we've identified the ISP's affected by the issue (yours being one of them) and our network engineers have been in talks with them ever since you would have noticed the issue return for you. Unfortunately, getting them to make the necessary changes can be a lengthy process that requires open collaboration between us and them.
When we think that the problem should be resolved we'll let everyone know. Otherwise if it takes a while longer I'll be sure to bring along some updates sooner.
Any news on this? I havent been able to play league for the full three days that I had off, thanks a bunch for taking this error seriously rito {{champion:26}}
Yeap 3 days of this thing so far, good times.

Just ran the Network Diag, Sent you in two files; one should be a normal one, and the second one should be after champ select.
I really hope you guys do something to remedy this afterwards riot. I've lost so much LP and been placed in Leaver busters twice because of this issue -.-

I got a firewall error as well, this error started recently again!!!

Although I ran across this issue before, it was working fine the past 3 month. 

Then this firewall issue started again in the past week or two. 

I tried all the solutions. I also spoke to my ISP provider.

I added port forwarding, flushed dns, added public dns, reseted internet explorer etc from your support page.

Can confirm I am being hit with this constantly. Has cost me a series and twice now with leave buster (up to 10 mins) Realize the issue is obviously quite complicated and will take time to resolve, however PUNISHING players for experiencing an issue on RIOT's end is beyond logical. Disable leave buster, remove all current queue's and add in game warnings.

while your solutions don't work, I already got banned for 10 minutes wait time for 5 games by leaver buster in my smurf accounts. Luckily nothing happened to this account yet :) But my smurfs already in my bad list:( I might get perma ban soon there.
